Source code for pytorchart.moremeters.bestmeter




[docs]class BestValueMeter(object):
    def __init__(self, metric=None, top=True):
        self.reset()
        self._top = top
        self._metric = metric
        self.m = 0
        self.val = 0


[docs]    def add(self, value, m=None):
        if self._metric is not None and m is not None:
            mv = self._metric(m)
            if self._top is True and mv > self.m:
                self.val = value
                self.m = mv
            elif self._top is False and mv < self.m:
                self.val = value
                self.m = mv
        elif self._top is True and value > self.val:
            self.val = value
        elif self._top is False and value < self.val:

            self.val = value


[docs]    def value(self):

        return self.val


[docs]    def reset(self):
        self.val = 0

        self.m = 0
